text: Lɨci 14.9 CHL 13.12-18 Asɨ dɨ ciaŋ hali hɨsɨŋ mu agaŋ nudɨ sɨvɨ vevɨla ula ula abi uami. Hulaŋ iamɨgali agɨlaŋ fɨli hali sɨhɨm sabaŋ mugaŋ lamɨgaŋ me agasaŋ sɨhɨ iahaiaha nudɨ ibi mɨŋaiahavi aba abi uami. Kɨlɨ cɨkaŋ hɨvɨ nudɨ mugaŋ lamɨgaŋ me lɨhua lamavɨci hɨnilalɨ agasaŋ avi sɨhɨ iahaiaha nudɨ ibi mɨŋaiahavi aba abi uami. Mɨŋaiahavɨdaci nudɨ sihɨ agaŋ nulɨdɨ lɨbam hɨvɨ human hɨvɨ hɨniavi aba abi uami.
